error.signature: Execution failed due to a timeout error
error.regex: (Execution failed due to a timeout|Endpoint request timed out|504\s*Gateway Time-?out)

verdict.summary: API Gateway request exceeded the 29-second integration timeout limit for the backend.

dead_ends.action: Increase API Gateway timeout beyond 29 seconds
dead_ends.why_fails: API Gateway has a hard limit of 29 seconds for integration timeout that cannot be increased
If the backend is inherently slow, retries will also time out, wasting resources

workarounds.action: Use asynchronous invocation pattern with Step Functions or SQS
workarounds.how: Return 202 Accepted immediately, process in background, client polls for result

workarounds.action: Optimize backend Lambda/service to respond within 29 seconds
workarounds.how: Profile the backend, reduce cold starts, optimize database queries, increase Lambda memory

leads_to.condition: Lambda backend also exceeds its own timeout

preceded_by.condition: Lambda timeout triggers API Gateway timeout

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Lambda timeout is backend-side; API Gateway timeout is the gateway enforcing its 29s limit regardless of backend config
